name: Slack Notifier Agent (Mock)
description: Mocks sending a Slack notification by logging the target and message.

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this agent.

skills.name: Send Slack Notification (Mock)
skills.description: Logs the intended Slack target and message.

target.description: The target Slack channel or user ID (e.g., '#alerts', 'U123ABC').

message_text.description: The text content of the message to send.

success.description: Indicates if the mock notification was logged successfully (always true for mock).
